frame.name: EchoStream
frame.subtitle: Discover, Create, and Own Music Moments Together
frame.description: A social music discovery and tipping platform for music fans and indie artists on Base, enabling collaborative playlists, ETH tipping, and artist support.
frame.tagline: Discover, Create, and Own Music Moments Together
frame.ogDescription: Discover, create, and own music moments together. Support your favorite artists with ETH tips.
